allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: IB Gateway port for paper trading \(4002 instead of 4001\)

- Port 4001 = Live Trading
- Port 4002 = Paper Trading \(default\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add VNC configuration and noVNC browser access

- VNC password configurable in UI
- noVNC link to access IB Gateway in browser \(port 6080\)
- Port hint table \(4001=Live, 4002=Paper\)
- Updated docker-compose.yml with noVNC port

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
